text: The Rock Mill Covered Bridge, on State Route 41 at Rock Mill, Ohio in Bloom Township, Fairfield County, Ohio, is a Queen Post truss bridge. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1976. It is a single-span wooden covered bridge spanning a deep gorge of the Hocking River. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Covered bridges in Ohio Category:National Register of Historic Places in Fairfield County, Ohio Category:Infrastructure completed in 1901
title: Rock Mill Covered Bridge
